使い残し: (つかいのこし) - remnant; remainder; odds and ends; leavings
使い残り: (つかいのこり) - remnant; remainder; odds and ends; leavings
使い熟す: (つかいこなす) - to handle (men); to master (a tool); to manage; to acquire a command of (a language)
使い物: (つかいもの) - (usu. in the negative)  useful thing/usable article; (遣い物 only) present/gift
使い物にならない: (つかいものにならない) - no use; useless; not fit for its purpose
使い賃: (つかいちん) - messenger tip or charge
使い込む: (つかいこむ) - to embezzle/to misappropriate/to peculate; to accustom oneself to using/to use for a long time
使い過ぎる: (つかいすぎる) - to use excessively; to use too much; to spend too much; to overwork someone
使い道: (つかいみち) - use; purpose to which something is put; function
使い馴れる: (つかいなれる) - to get accustomed to using
使い魔: (つかいま) - familiar (spirit or otherwise magical creature which aids a magician or sorcerer); familiar spirit
使う: (tsukau) - to use (uma coisa, método, etc.), to make use of, to put to use; to use (a person, animal, puppet, etc.), to employ, to handle, to manage, to manipulate , to use (a thing, method, etc.), to make use of, to put to use; to use (a person, animal, puppet, etc.), to employ, to handle, to manage, to manipulate; to use (time, money, etc.), to spend, to consume; to use (language), to speak
使える: (つかえる) - to be usable; to be serviceable; to be useful
使って表す: (つかってひょうす) - express ... in terms of ...
使む: (しむ) - to make happen (old causative verbal ending)
使わざるを得ず: (つかわざるをえず) - forced to use; forced into a position
使わざるを得ない: (つかわざるをえない) - forced to use; forced into a position
使わす: (つかわす) - to send/to dispatch/to despatch; (after て form, slightly pompous) to bestow (favour, etc.)/to grant (e.g. pardon)
使令: (しれい) - giving orders to someone and making use of him; servant
使命を帯びる: (しめいをおびる) - to be charged with a mission
使命を果たす: (しめいをはたす) - to carry out one's mission
使命意識: (しめいいしき) - (yoji) sense of (one's) mission; awareness of one's duty (calling)
使命感: (しめいかん) - sense of duty; sense of purpose
使役: (しえき) - employing/using/setting to work/enslavement; causative (verb, etc.)
使徒書: (しとしょ) - the Epistles (of the New Testament)
使徒書簡: (しとしょかん) - the Epistles (of the New Testament)
使徒行伝: (しとぎょうでん) - Acts of the Apostles (book of the Bible)
使徒言行録: (しとげんこうろく) - Acts of the Apostles (book of the Bible)
使用できる: (しようできる) - fit for use; available; operational; practicable; usable
使用パラメータ制御: (しようパラメータせいぎょ) - user parameter control; UPC
使用不能時間: (しようふのうじかん) - unavailable time
使用中: (しようちゅう) - busy; in the middle (of)
使用出来る: (しようできる) - fit for use; available; operational; practicable; usable
使用前: (しようぜん) - before use; pre-service; pre-operational
使用可能: (しようかのう) - available; enabled; can be used; may be used
使用可能時間: (しようかのうじかん) - available time
使用後: (しようご) - after use; after occurring
使用性試験: (しようせいしけん) - usability test; fitness-for-use test
使用方法: (しようほうほう) - how to use (something); usage instructions; directions (for usage); use; usage
使用期限: (しようきげん) - expiry date; use-by date; date of expiry
使用権: (しようけん) - use; right to use
使用済み: (しようずみ) - already finished being used; second-hand; no longer used
使用済み切手: (しようずみきって) - used stamps
使用済み核燃料: (しようずみかくねんりょう) - spent nuclear fuel
使用済み燃料プール: (しようすみねんりょうプール) - spent fuel pool; SPF; storage pool for spent nuclear fuel
使用済核燃料: (しようずみかくねんりょう) - spent nuclear fuel
使用率: (しようりつ) - utilization rate; activity ratio
使用率パラメータ制御: (しようりつパラメータせいぎょ) - user parameter control; UPC
使用目的: (しようもくてき) - intended use; intended purpose
使用規制: (しようきせい) - usage restrictions, limitations
使用許諾契約: (しようきょだくけいやく) - (software) license agreement
使用距離: (しようきょり) - usable distance (of a fiber)
使用頻度: (しようひんど) - frequency of use
使者を遣わす: (ししゃをつかわす) - to dispatch a messenger; to despatch a messenger
使途: (しと) - purpose for which money is spent; the way money is spent; how goods are used
侃々諤々: (かんかんがくがく) - (yoji) outspoken; arguing (heatedly) what one believes in; insisting on something without restraint
侃々諤諤: (かんかんがくがく) - (yoji) outspoken; arguing (heatedly) what one believes in; insisting on something without restraint
